description: Try our easy to follow Banana Crepes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury crepe,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Blueberry,Tree nut free,Quick & easy breakfast,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Pear,Banana,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Banana Crepes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place oats in a food processor and process until finely ground. Add banana flour, eggs and milk and process until well combined.
Combine yoghurt and cinnamon in a small bowl and set aside for serving.

Heat a crepe pan over medium heat and spray lightly with oil. Pour 1/8 of the batter into the pan, tilting from side to side to cover the base. Cook for about 1 minute or until golden. Flip and cook second side for about 30 seconds. Repeat with remaining batter.
Serve crepes with slices of pear, banana and blueberries, cinnamon yoghurt and a drizzle of honey.
